mapper.select: select sum(liter) as liter from oss_daily_TradeAccount where takedate >= #{begin, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and takedate <=#{end, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update oss_daily_TradeAccount
CardNo = #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MachineOilNo = #{machineoilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OilNo = #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTC = #{ctc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OpeNo = #{openo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Liter = #{liter,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
PumpNo = #{pumpno,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TAC = #{tac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GMAC = #{gmac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PSAM_TAC = #{psamTac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PSAM_ASN = #{psamAsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TempinalNo = #{tempinalno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PSAM_TTC = #{psamTtc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MoneySou = #{moneysou,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PayMode = #{paymode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PayUnit = #{payunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T_MAC = #{tMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AccountDate = #{accountdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TraCode = #{tracode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GetTime = #{gettime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Key_Version = #{keyVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Key_Index = #{keyIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CompMatchFlag = #{compmatchflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CompNo = #{compno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BackMatchFlag = #{backmatchflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PayTypeFlag = #{paytypeflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Shift = #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TransFlag = #{transflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IsRecieved = #{isrecieved,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MacNo = #{macno,jdbcType=INTEGER} and TTC = #{ttc,jdbcType=INTEGER} and TakeDate = #{takedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and OilGun = #{oilgun,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update oss_daily_TradeAccount set CardNo = #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MachineOilNo = #{machineoilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OilNo = #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTC = #{ctc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OpeNo = #{openo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Liter = #{liter,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, PumpNo = #{pumpno,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TAC = #{tac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GMAC = #{gmac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PSAM_TAC = #{psamTac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PSAM_ASN = #{psamAsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TempinalNo = #{tempinalno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PSAM_TTC = #{psamTtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MoneySou = #{moneysou,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PayMode = #{paymode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PayUnit = #{payunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T_MAC = #{tMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AccountDate = #{accountdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TraCode = #{tracode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GetTime = #{gettime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Key_Version = #{keyVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Key_Index = #{keyIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CompMatchFlag = #{compmatchflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CompNo = #{compno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BackMatchFlag = #{backmatchflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PayTypeFlag = #{paytypeflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Shift = #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TransFlag = #{transflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsRecieved = #{isrecieved,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MacNo = #{macno,jdbcType=INTEGER} and TTC = #{ttc,jdbcType=INTEGER} and TakeDate = #{takedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and OilGun = #{oilgun,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE oss_daily_TradeAccount SET IsRecieved=#{IsRecieved,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE MacNo=#{macno} AND TTC=#{ttc} AND OilGun=#{oilgun} AND TakeDate=#{takedate};
mapper.select: SELECT PumpNo,MAX(TakeDate) takedate FROM oss_daily_TradeAccount WHERE OilGun=#{_parameter} GROUP BY OilGun
SELECT DISTINCT shift FROM oss_daily_TradeAccount WHERE TakeDate >= #{begindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{enddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}>=TakeDate ORDER BY Shift
SELECT sum(Liter) FROM oss_daily_TradeAccount WHERE BackCanFlag IS NULL AND OilGun=#{OilGun} AND Shift=#{Shift}
SELECT OilNo AS oilno,SUM(IFNULL(Liter, 0)) AS liter FROM oss_daily_TradeAccount WHERE AccountDate IS NULL GROUP BY OilNo
SELECT OilNo as oilno,SUM(Liter) as liter FROM oss_daily_TradeAccount WHERE (Shift IS NULL OR Shift='' OR Shift >#{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND Liter IS NOT NULL GROUP BY OilNo
mapper.update: UPDATE oss_daily_TradeAccount set AccountDate = #{accountdate} WHERE Shift>=#{minshift} AND Shift <=#{maxshift}
